representation_information.name: Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects (formal name); MPEG-4, Advanced Video Coding (part 10), High 4:4:4 Profile
representation_information.description: The High 4:4:4 Profile supports 4:4:4 chroma at 12 bits per channel, adaptive macroblock-level switching between 8x8 and 4x4 transform block size, encoder-specified quantization scaling matrices, encoder-specified separate control of the quantization parameter for each chroma component, and monochrome sequences. It also supports residual color transform and predictive lossless coding.
